text.p: Goyo (1986) 179,000 dwt 13.5 on 45 del Cont Oct for 12 months trading $16,000 daily net China Steel Express.
Santa Isabel (1996) 158,387 dwt del Hamburg mid-June trip via Brazil redel Japan $21,500 daily Klaveness.
Apj Shalin (1989) 76,640 dwt 13 on 36 plus 3 del Maracalibo 10-15/6 trip via Cont $8,250 daily plus $10,000 bb Tschudi and Eitzen.
Samsara (1978) 75,200 dwt 12 on 39 plus 3 del Gib ppt two laden legs via Brazil redel Skaw-Passero $7,200 daily Coe and Clerici.
Thetis (1993) 73,000 dwt 13.5 on 32 plus 1.5 del Brazil mid-june two laden legs redel Far East $11,500 daily plus $250,000 bb Marifran.
World Raven (1996) 72,300 dwt del Japan 4-10/6 one/two laden legs via west Australia redel St Lawrence/USG range $6,350 daily BTG.
Antonis I. Angelicoussis (1989) 69,346 dwt 13.5 on 26 plus 1.25 del NSW 15-25/6 trip via Japan $9,100 daily plus $170,000 bb NYK.
Lionsgate Bulker (1996) 69,091 dwt 13.5/14.0 on 31 del Mizushima early-June trip via Gladstone redel Japan approx $9,200 daily Navix.
Eastern Queen (1994) 69,800 dwt 13.5 on 29.5 plus 2 del Matsuura 6-7/6 for Australian r/v $9,300 daily Japanese charterers.
Artemis (1990) 68,788 dwt 14 on 32 del Kashima 5-10/6 trip via NOPAC redel Far East $8,500 daily Pan Ocean.
Atlantic Pride (1978) 68,730 dwt 13 on 29 plus 2 retro Rotterdam 27/5 trip via ECSA redel Shaw-Passero range $8,125 daily D'Amato.
Nan Hai (1996) 45,189 dwt 14 on 25 del Cont June trip via Far East $13,500 daily Pan Ocean.
